front.title: I2NSF Registration Interface YANG Data Model

abstract.t: This document defines an information model and a YANG data model for Interface to Network Security Functions (I2NSF) Registration Interface between Security Controller and Developer's Management System (DMS). The objective of these information and data models is to support NSF capability registration and query via I2NSF Registration Interface. Editorial Note (To be removed by RFC Editor) Please update these statements within the document with the RFC number to be assigned to this document: "This version of this YANG module is part of RFC XXXX;" "RFC XXXX: I2NSF Registration Interface YANG Data Model" "reference: RFC XXXX" Please update the "revision" date of the YANG module.
